title: A Valuable Land for Sale in Kalutara
details:
• The land is located within 100 meters (landside) from the Galle Road
• Land extent- 12 perches bare land
• The land bears several coconut and fruit trees
• Land is within very close proximity to leading schools (Holy Cross College, Holy Family Convent, and Kalutara Vidyalaya)
• 5 minutes to Kalutara Town
• Located in a highly residential area
